mapper.select: SELECT id, title, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, category, user_email FROM calendar_events
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_events (id, title, start_date, end_date, category, user_email) VALUES (calendar_events_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{category}, #{userEmail})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM calendar_events WHERE id = #{id} AND user_email = #{userEmail}
